name: Pyokomon
description:
Place frogs and fight in a sumo-style arena. Breed new frogs and level up to become a stronger team of frogs. Leap for the stars and retire while you're  still having fun.

Developed by:

https://github.com/mvanbaalen

https://github.com/sapporovhs
